title: Henhouse Prowlers
text:
The Henhouse Prowlers are an American four-piece band who play and promote bluegrass music. They call themselves "Bluegrass Ambassadors" and make efforts to promote bluegrass music and other world music (such as African music). They run educational music workshops, claiming, "Our Mission is to educate and inspire through the cultural exchange of music".


== Personnel ==
Ben Wright – banjo, vocals 
Jake Howard – mandolin, vocals
Chris Dollar – guitar, vocals
Jon Goldfine – double bass, vocals


== Discography ==
Henhouse Prowlers, 2006
A Dark Rumor, 2009
Verses Chapters & Rhymes, 2011
Direct from Chicago, 2012
Breaking Ground, 2013
Still On That Ride, 2015
Separation Man  2017
Live From Kyrgyzstan, 2017
The Departure, 2020
Shart Branch Saloon, 2021
Bluegrass Ambassadors Sessions: Vol. 1", 2022
Lead and Iron, 2023
